name: ROTii
description: An adorable puzzle/platformer where you take on the role of a 4" tall cleaning robot. Protect Nida's house from an onslaught of mutated bugs. Jump, vacuum, and solve puzzles to keep the house clean!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 1GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Video Memory Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
